text: (yutarkale!) Ya'akupukku maranam vanta camayattil (avarukku) arukamaiyil iruntirkala? Avar tan cantatikalai nokki ‘‘enakkup pinnar etai vanankuvirkal?'' Enak kettatarku ‘‘umatu iraivanum, umatu mutataikalana iprahim, ismayil, is'hak akiyavarkalin iraivanumana ore or iraivanaiye vanankuvom. Avanukku murrilum panintu valippatta muslimkalakave iruppom'' enre kurinarkal
